description: &2End Cities&r are guarded by &cShulkers&r, which shoot homing bolts that inflict &3Levitation&r.
The projectiles can be &3blocked&r or &3attacked&r to &ddispel them&r.
If you're hit, careful navigation or throwing &3Ender Pearls&r can help &davoid fall damage&r from levitation.
When Shulkers close their shells, they gain high &3defense&r.
Shulkers do not respawn naturally, but if &3hit by a a shulker bolt&r, a Shulker might &dmultiply&r.
&7[Carpet]&r Chorus Fruit &dcompletely cancels fall damage&r on grounding.
